#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	
	int i,j;
	
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<n-i;j++)cout<<" ";
		
		for(j=i+1;j>=1;j--)cout<<j;
		
		for(j=2;j<=i+1;j++)cout<<j;
		
		cout<<"\n";

	}
	
	for(i=n-1;i>=1;i--)
	{
		for(j=0;j<n-i+1;j++)cout<<" ";
		
		for(j=i;j>=1;j--)cout<<j;
		
		for(j=2;j<=i;j++)cout<<j;
		
		cout<<"\n";

	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
